title: Arsenal legend Robert Pires overlooks Thierry Henry as he chooses Dennis Bergkamp as the best talent he played alongside at the Gunners
text:
Sport Arsenal legend Robert Pires overlooks Thierry Henry as he chooses Dennis Bergkamp as the best talent he played alongside at the Gunners Pires forged an unforgettable partnership with Thierry Henry during the famous Invincibles team but he picked the Dutch master as the best player at the north London club Share Pires will never forget his spell alongside Bergkamp (Photo: Getty) Share Get Arsenal FC   Thank you for subscribing!   
Arsenal legend Robert Pires has surprisingly overlooked Thierry Henry and chosen Dennis Bergkamp as the best talent he played alongside at Arsenal. 
Pires was a crucial member of the famous Invincible side that went unbeaten during the 2003/04 season as they lifted the title. 
The Frenchman forged a formidable partnership with Henry as they scored 73 goals and finished 11 points ahead of Chelsea. Pires and Henry enjoyed a special bond at Arsenal (Photo: AFP) 
But despite their close friendship, Pires has named Dutch master Bergkamp as the best player he lined up with at the Gunners. 
Having won the Premier League title four-years earlier, Bergkamp showed that age is just a number as he produced best his quality once again at 34 to play a major role in Arsenal's unforgettable unbeaten campaign. 
Pires, speaking on Sky Sports Snapchat Takeover, said: "With Arsenal there was Thierry Henry but I think the best was Dennis Bergkamp.‚Äù Pires has special praise for the French master Zidane (Photo: Reuters) 
Pires has no doubts about the best international team-mate he played alongside and said the French master played a big part in his career. 
Pires added: "With the national team it would be Zinedine Zidane. 
"He was one of the best players in the world and it was a privilege for me because I learnt a lot from training with him." poll loading Whose dream Arsenal five-a-side team would win? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
